title: Are you the spouse, civil partner or child of the person who died
question: Are you the spouse, civil partner or child of the person who died?
hintText1: You must be the husband, wife, civil partner or a child over 18 to continue with your application online.
hintText2: This does not include long-term partners who lived together but did not marry or enter into a civil partnership.
hintText3: You may need to provide your certificate of marriage or civil partnership.
